name: Praos Smart Security
description: Offers smart home security systems with 24-hour monitored security, customizable plans, and free equipment/installation with monitored new system plans. They are listed as part of the Central VA African American Chamber of Commerce

name: iGlobal Security
address: Not explicitly listed, but serves Virginia
description: A woman, minority, and black-owned business providing security, law enforcement, and investigation services. Offers a 24-hour dispatch center and remote monitoring

name: Vector Security
description: Provides home and business security solutions with 24/7/365 professional monitoring

name: Guardian Protection
description: Offers 24/7 professional monitoring for burglary, fire, CO alarms, and security cameras, along with smart home automation

name: Prosegur
address: Operates throughout Virginia, with teams in Ashburn
description: Offers customized security solutions for businesses, including remote security monitoring and 24/7 emergency response

name: True Protection
address: Serves Arlington, VA, and surrounding areas
description: Provides home and business security systems with 24/7 monitoring, backed by Brinks Home Security. They emphasize being a local provider

name: Securitas Technology
description: Offers commercial security services in Richmond, VA, including intrusion detection, video surveillance, and 24/7 monitoring support

name: Secure Black Ops (BOSS-C)
description: A disabled veteran and American Indian-owned business offering a range of security services, including CCTV and alarm monitoring, operating 24/7

name: Central Security Services, LLC
description: A licensed and insured security company offering classes and guard services. While not explicitly stating 24/7 monitoring, they are listed under "Security" in the Hampton Roads Green Book, which focuses on Black-owned businesses

name: A. Eaton Associates LLC (Security)
description: Provides professional security services and is listed as Black-owned in the Hampton Roads Green Book. Their services may include monitoring, though not explicitly detailed as 24/7
